text:
"Makanlah"ujar lelaki itu berharap penuh Sarada mau memakannya.
Sarada menatap lelaki itu,Perubahan yang Sarada sama sekali tidak menjangka.Dia mengira lelaki itu berlaku kasar padanya tapi.....
Dugaannya salah.
Perlahan dia mulai memakan sesuap nasi goreng yang Boruto berikan padanya,tanpa mengalihkan pandangannya pada lelaki itu.
Terlihat raut wajah ceria dari lelaki itu disaat Sarada memakan Nasi goreng.
Boruto tersenyum saat Sarada mau memakan hasil suapannya.Rasanya sedikit ceria dalam hatinya,dan tanpa sadar tangan kekarnya menepuk-nepuk pucuk kepala wanita itu.
"Good Women"puji lelaki itu dan kembali menyuapinya.
Sarada sendiri tertegun saja melihat Boruto.Dirinya tak percaya Boruto entah sadar atau tidak menepuk kepalanya,mengundang desiran aneh diperutnya.
Dia langsung memaling wajahnya menghindari tatapan lelaki itu dan mulut yang masih mengunyah.
trans:
“Eat up,” the man said, full of hope that Sarada would take a bite.
Sarada looked at him, surprised by the unexpected change. She assumed he would be rough with her, but.....
Her assumption was wrong.
Slowly, she began to eat a spoonful of the fried rice Boruto had given her, without looking away from him.
The man's face lit up with joy as Sarada ate the fried rice.
Boruto smiled as Sarada accepted the mouthful he offered. A sense of happiness bloomed in his heart, and without realizing it, his strong hand gently patted the top of her head.
“Good Women,” he praised, before offering another bite.
Sarada was taken aback by Boruto’s actions. She couldn’t believe that Boruto, whether he realized it or not, was patting her head, which sent a strange flutter through her stomach.
She quickly turned her face away to avoid the man's gaze, with her mouth still chewing.
